Aradan sular seller ge√ßti ve birka√ß hafta √∂nce artƒ±k bu seriyi bitirmeliyim diye d√º≈ü√ºnd√ºm. 18 saat sonunda t√ºm Bioshock serisini ve dlclerini bitirmi≈ü bulunmaktayƒ±m. ƒ∞≈üte Bioshock Infinite incelemem:

[h1] Hikaye [/h1]

Bu oyun √∂ncekilere nazaran olduk√ßa farklƒ± ba≈ülƒ±yor, Rapture ≈üehrinin karanlƒ±k ve basƒ±k koridorlarƒ±nda bulmuyoruz kendimizi. Aksine taa 1912'de ge√ßiyor oyun ve bu sefer ferah mƒ± ferah g√∂ky√ºz√º ≈üehri Columbia'dayƒ±z. Kli≈üe bir ≈üekilde ba≈ülayan hikaye derin karakterlere sahip ve bir zaman sonra √∂yle bir √ßetrefilleniyor ki ilk ba≈ütaki kli≈üeliƒüin bilerek yapƒ±ldƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ±, oyuncularƒ±n b√∂yle d√º≈ü√ºnmesi istenildiƒüini anlƒ±yorsunuz. 

Bioshock evreninin geni≈ü loreu sayesinde oyunlarda hikaye epey 'wowww demek √∂yle≈ümi≈ü!' dedirttirir. Oyun bir noktada kƒ±rƒ±lƒ±r ve bildiƒüiniz her ≈üeyin nasƒ±l bir yanƒ±ltmaca olduƒüunu, her zaman paranƒ±n yanlƒ±≈ü y√ºz√ºne baktƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ±zƒ± anlarsƒ±nƒ±z. Beyninizde noktalar birle≈ümeye ba≈ülar. O y√ºzden, hikaye hakkƒ±nda bahsetmek istemiyorum, s√ºprizi ka√ßarsa anlamƒ± kalmaz. 

Fakat hayatƒ±nƒ±zda g√∂rd√ºƒü√ºn√ºz en iyi oyun hikayelerinden biri olacaƒüƒ±na garanti verebilirim. √áok g√ºzel kitap √ßƒ±kar bu hikayeden. 

[h1] Oynayƒ±≈ü [/h1]

A√ßƒ±k√ßasƒ± oyunun en zayƒ±f y√∂n√º sanƒ±rƒ±m. Oynayƒ±≈ü olduk√ßa ham kalƒ±yor. √ñnceki oyunlarƒ±n √ºst√ºne gelen tek mekanik sky-hook denilen bir halt. Mantƒ±ƒüƒ± √ßok g√ºzel fakat oyuna pek yansƒ±tamamƒ±≈ülar zaten. Onun dƒ±≈üƒ±nda gerek silah t√ºrleri gerek √∂nceki oyunlardan a≈üina olduƒüumuz plasmidler tamamen aynƒ±. Hatta plasmidler bu oyunda olduk√ßa i≈ülevsiz olmu≈ü diyebilirim. √ñnceden hasar falan vuruyorlardƒ±. ≈ûimdi 8 tane plasmid var(bu oyunda isimleri vigor diye ge√ßiyor) 8 plasmidin de olayƒ± aynƒ±: D√º≈ümanƒ± durdur. X plasmidini kullan d√º≈üman dursun sƒ±k √∂ld√ºr, y plasmidini kullan d√º≈üman dursun sƒ±k √∂ld√ºr vesaire vesaire... 

Yenilik olmamasƒ±nƒ±n yanƒ±nda beklentilerinizi √ßok da a≈üaƒüƒ± √ßekmeyin. √á√ºnk√º mekanikler √∂nceki oyunlarla aynƒ± olsada hala olduk√ßa zevkliler.

[h1] √áevre [/h1]

Columbia olduk√ßa g√ºzel bir ≈üehir. √áevre tasarƒ±mlarƒ±na olduk√ßa √∂zenilmi≈ü. Gezdiƒüiniz her sokakta her caddede detaylarƒ±n ilmek ilmek i≈ülendiƒüini g√∂r√ºyorsunuz. Her b√∂l√ºm farklƒ± bir mekandasƒ±nƒ±z ve mekanlar asla tekrara d√º≈üm√ºyor. Hatta oyunun ba≈üƒ±nda a√ßƒ±k d√ºnya mƒ± lan acaba diye d√º≈ü√ºnm√º≈üt√ºm. ƒ∞yiki deƒüil orasƒ± ayrƒ±. 

Sanƒ±rƒ±m √ßevreyle ilgili tek sƒ±kƒ±ntƒ± hikaye anlatƒ±lƒ±rken √ßevre √ßok fazla kullanƒ±lƒ±yor. Nasƒ±l? √ñnceki oyunlardan hatƒ±rlarsƒ±nƒ±z, lanet bir telsizimiz var; bir susmuyor. Herkes sizinle oradan konu≈üuyor, ikide bir ses kaydƒ± bulup oradan dinliyorsunuz falan. ƒ∞lk iki oyunun en b√ºy√ºk sƒ±kƒ±ntƒ±sƒ±ydƒ±. Ses kaydƒ± dinlemekten oyunu oynayamƒ±yordunuz. Lan her girdiƒüim odada bir ses kaydƒ±. Hayƒ±r the last of us tarzƒ± ek bilgiler olsa neyse. Kayƒ±tlarƒ± dinlemeyen bir adam oyunun %80'ƒ∞ni bilmez. 

Bu oyunda bu durum √∂ncekilere nazaran daha iyi. Artƒ±k kimse bizimle telsizden konu≈ümuyor. Ama ses kaydƒ± meredi azaltƒ±≈ümƒ±≈ü da olsa devam ediyor. Bioshock 1'deki ses kayƒ±tlarƒ±nƒ±n toplam uzunluƒüu 8-9 roman tutardƒ± heralde. Ama Infinite'te 2 romanƒ± ge√ßmez. 

Bu arada nedense ≈ü√∂yle ilgin√ß bir durum var, ses kayƒ±tlarƒ±nƒ±n alt yazƒ±sƒ± yok. Metin hazƒ±rlanmamƒ±≈ü mƒ± acaba diye d√º≈ü√ºnd√ºm ba≈üta, hayƒ±r men√ºye girince ses kayƒ±tlarƒ±nƒ±n yazƒ±lƒ± halini g√∂r√ºyorsunuz. ƒ∞lgin√ß.

[h1] Fiyat [/h1]

Maalesef artƒ±k bir oyunu alƒ±rken en √∂nemli unsur haline geldi. Ben alalƒ± baya zaman oluyor. Yeni fiyatƒ±nƒ± da kontrol etmedim. Ama ben The Collection s√ºr√ºm√ºn√º olaƒüan√ºst√º ucuz aldƒ±ƒüƒ±mƒ± hatƒ±rlƒ±yorum.

jogo maravilhoso

La jugabilidad fue muy divertida. La selecci√≥n de vigors fue interesante. Encontr√© que los vigores Bucking Bronco y Undertow son los m√°s entretenidos para usar contra enemigos. Especialmente cuando se lucha al aire libre, donde los enemigos pueden caer.

La atm√≥sfera del juego principal es totalmente diferente a la de los juegos Bioshock anteriores. La conexi√≥n entre este juego y sus predecesores no parece estar clara al principio, pero los DLC hicieron un buen trabajo al explicarlo.

En general, recomiendo encarecidamente jugar a este juego incluso si no has jugado los dos primeros. Es un gran juego en el que puedes jugar de manera diferente cada vez debido a su rejugabilidad (para m√≠, al menos).

Finished it in 7 hours. Little bit short but not as short as some other games I've played. Good graphics for a 2013 game. Would recommend to people who like story rich games. This game is similar to Metro Exodus.

Quite possibly my favorite game of all time. The story is fucking amazing, the characters are written perfectly and the gunplay is entertaining as hell. Starting with the story, was so intriguing and has so many twists and turns that I found it difficult to stop playing. The character writing is a thing of beauty, booker and Elizabeth are such a good duo and I found myself get more attached to Elizabeth than any other character in any other game. There is a great variety of guns and upgrades to them and the gun play feels satisfying. Could not recommend this game enough

Very incredible world and atmosphere with countless details that make you truly feel immersed in this game. Interesting story which is engaging and does not lose your interest part way through like other games. The default controls are a bit strange but can rebind them, the gun-play is quite simple and fun and there are a few challenging fights even on standard difficulty. The game took me 8 hours to complete the main story with a bit of exploring and looting inbetween. Thoroughly enjoyed it.
wow so epic
Awesome game, very revolutionary in terms of mechanics. The skyline flights help to change the arena fights

TLDR: This game should have not been a Bioshock game and it would have been so much better. However, I think you should give it a shot.

Let me be honest for once about this game: I hate that people say it is the best in the series. It is not nearly as interesting or fun as the first two and it feels like this was a misstep after Bioshock one and two. 
The Good:
1. Guns are satisfying to shoot and fun to use.
2. Unique Plasmids (salts) that are decent to play with.
3. Columbia is a beautiful city.
4. Elizabeth is a very useful NPC
The Bad:
1. You can beat this game without using your salts and it seems like a lot of the game is based in just shooting and killing things. 
2. As a result, this game just feels much more like a brainless fps that thinks it's smarter than it really is. 

The Ugly:
1. The Lutece twins are so fucking annoying. They feel like someone wanted to include "quirky" and "weird" people and figured annoying people that just say faux smart things are a great way to do it.
2. The ending is awful. It's like they remembered they were making a bioshock game and quickly threw together the wrap up. It feels like a slap in the face when this trash heap of an ending happens. It feels like there's supposed to be a smart message here but it falls flat and the link to the OG games are weak af. Disappointing for sure. 

Overall it is a solid 7/10 game dragged down to a 4.5/10 because of a bad ending. Disappointing.

Extremamente quente
Always an amazing game to play through multiple times. Bioshock never seems to fail.

Trippy game, and great atmosphere. In terms of story and setting this game is amazing, the gameplay is pretty much the same from Bioshock 1 with new vigors and a skyline mechanic. However I found myself rarely going out of my way to experiment with different vigors and pretty much just depended on Shock Jockey and Bucking Bronco for the majority of the game. If you really like FPS shooters then you might like the gameplay more than I did but I got pretty tired of it about 7 hours in, but I stayed for the story which I think alone deserves a giving this game a playthrough. I'd recommend playing Bioshock 1 first though since there are some references to the game towards the end.

Another good catch. Maybe I'm just too obsessed with postmodernistic narratives (nope), but this was good. Even not being any steampunk fan, the plot is just good, makes you think, follow the greatly written story.

Great game but can't recommend as it has a game breaking bug that can show up and makes it so you cant finish the game and there is no way around it. The answer to the bug just keep reloading the level and hope for the best. I've done that and reinstall the game over and over again and same out come every time and the bug is close to the end so yeah. Take a chance and hope for the best and maybe get to play it to the end or get BONED and never get to finish the game.
